name: Windows Meterpreter (Reflective Injection x64), Windows x64 Bind TCP Stager

description:
Inject the meterpreter server DLL via the Reflective Dll Injection payload (staged). Requires Windows XP SP2 or newer.

Listen for a connection (Windows x64)
